# Version Declaration: <version> - <title>

> **Source of truth for what this release contains.**
> One VD = one `release/<version>` branch.

|---|---|

| **Release Branch** | `release/<version>` |

| **Started** | YYYY-MM-DD |
| **Target Release** | YYYY-MM-DD |
